name: Berry Global Group, Inc.
description: Berry Global Group, Inc. is a leading global manufacturer and supplier of a wide range of plastic products, with a commitment to sustainability and innovation. Founded in 1967 and headquartered in Evansville, Indiana, Berry Global operates in multiple sectors, including consumer packaging, healthcare, and industrial applications. The company specializes in producing custom plastic packaging solutions, containers, and films that cater to various industries such as food and beverage, personal care, and pharmaceuticals. With a strong focus on circular economy principles, Berry Global aims to reduce plastic waste and enhance recyclability in its product offerings. The company’s extensive portfolio includes well-known brands and products that enhance convenience and safety while minimizing environmental impact. Berry Global is dedicated to driving positive change through sustainable practices and innovative design, investing in advanced technologies, and working towards a more sustainable future. As a testament to its commitment, Berry Global has set ambitious goals for reducing greenhouse gas emissions and increasing the use of recycled materials in its products, positioning itself as a responsible leader in the plastics industry.
